title: Opinion: Why Did Kamala Harris Lose? Because Democrats Guilt-Tripped Americans
content: Kamala Harriss campaign raised and spent more money than Donald Trump, but what was the substance? The political messaging barely managed to escape the rhetoric of Save America from Trump.
summary: Kamala Harriss campaign raised and spent more money than Donald Trump, but what was the substance? The political messaging barely managed to escape the rhetoric of Save America from Trump.

title: US Fed Cuts Interest Rates A Quarter Point After Trump Victory
content: The US Federal Reserve shrugged off concerns about the impact of Donald Trump's election victory on interest rates and moved ahead with a quarter point cut Thursday.
summary: The US Federal Reserve shrugged off concerns about the impact of Donald Trump's election victory on interest rates and moved ahead with a quarter point cut Thursday.

title: "First-Ever In US History": Trump Picks A Woman White House Chief Of Staff
content: Susie Wiles, who is credited for Donald Trump's successful presidential bid, is the daughter of Pat Summerall, a prominent football player and sportscaster.
summary: Susie Wiles, who is credited for Donald Trump's successful presidential bid, is the daughter of Pat Summerall, a prominent football player and sportscaster.

title: "I Don't See Future In US": Musk's Transgender Daughter After Trump's Win
content: Following Donald Trump's US election win, Elon Musk's estranged trans daughter, Vivian Wilson, announced her intention to leave the US, saying she doesn't see a future in the country.
summary: Following Donald Trump's US election win, Elon Musk's estranged trans daughter, Vivian Wilson, announced her intention to leave the US, saying she doesn't see a future in the country.

title: US Capitol Rioters, Supporters Of Donald Trump, Await Pardons
content: Donald Trump supporters who were charged with storming the US Capitol are now expecting pardons from the incoming American president, who has lauded them as "patriots" and "political prisoners."
summary: Donald Trump supporters who were charged with storming the US Capitol are now expecting pardons from the incoming American president, who has lauded them as "patriots" and "political prisoners."

title: F-15 Fighter Jets Arrive In Middle East: US Military
content: American F-15 fighter planes arrived in the Middle East on Thursday, the US military said, after Washington announced the deployment of additional assets to the region in a warning to Iran.
summary: American F-15 fighter planes arrived in the Middle East on Thursday, the US military said, after Washington announced the deployment of additional assets to the region in a warning to Iran.

title: "Evil": Father Accused Of Killing Pak-British Girl Blames Her Stepmother
content: The father of a 10-year-old British-Pakistani girl on Thursday denied her murder and instead blamed the girl's stepmother, calling her "evil" and "psycho".
summary: The father of a 10-year-old British-Pakistani girl on Thursday denied her murder and instead blamed the girl's stepmother, calling her "evil" and "psycho".

title: Zelensky Says North Korean Troops Suffered Losses In Clashes With Ukraine
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Thursday North Korean troops had suffered casualties in combat with Kyiv's forces and that some of the 11,000 troops sent to Russia's Kursk region had taken part in fighting.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Thursday North Korean troops had suffered casualties in combat with Kyiv's forces and that some of the 11,000 troops sent to Russia's Kursk region had taken part in fighting.

title: Putin Says Ukraine Must Remain Neutral For There To Be Peace
content: President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that Ukraine should remain neutral for there to be a chance for peace, adding that the borders of Ukraine should be in accordance with the wishes of the people living in Russian-claimed territory.
summary: President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that Ukraine should remain neutral for there to be a chance for peace, adding that the borders of Ukraine should be in accordance with the wishes of the people living in Russian-claimed territory.

title: Sugar In Infancy Linked To Higher Diabetes, Blood Pressure Risks: Study
content: Excessive sugar consumption, particularly in early life, is linked to increased risks of chronic diseases like type 2 diabetes and high blood pressure in adulthood.
summary: Excessive sugar consumption, particularly in early life, is linked to increased risks of chronic diseases like type 2 diabetes and high blood pressure in adulthood.

title: Donald Trump Names Campaign Manager Susie Wiles As Chief Of Staff
content: US President-elect Donald Trump named his campaign manager, Susie Wiles, as White House chief of staff on Thursday, his first major appointment since winning this week's election.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump named his campaign manager, Susie Wiles, as White House chief of staff on Thursday, his first major appointment since winning this week's election.

title: Donald Trump And UK's Keir Starmer Set For Rocky Special Relationship
content: Keir Starmer has insisted that the UK-US special relationship will "prosper" under Donald Trump but the British prime minister's Labour government has multiple reasons to fear the Republican's presidential comeback.
summary: Keir Starmer has insisted that the UK-US special relationship will "prosper" under Donald Trump but the British prime minister's Labour government has multiple reasons to fear the Republican's presidential comeback.

title: What Will Trump 2.0 Mean For US Tech?
content: What will Donald Trump's second stint in the White House mean for a US tech industry in the throes of an artificial intelligence frenzy? For sure Elon Musk will play a central role in Trump's Silicon Valley policies after backing his campaign.
summary: What will Donald Trump's second stint in the White House mean for a US tech industry in the throes of an artificial intelligence frenzy? For sure Elon Musk will play a central role in Trump's Silicon Valley policies after backing his campaign.

title: Trump's 1st Appointment Marks A Historic First. Other Top Contenders Are...
content: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday made the first appointment of his new administration -- naming a chief of staff -- with other key jobs set to be filled in the "days and weeks ahead," according to his team.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday made the first appointment of his new administration -- naming a chief of staff -- with other key jobs set to be filled in the "days and weeks ahead," according to his team.

title: US Military Judge Rules 9/11 Mastermind Plea Deal Is Valid
content: Plea agreements with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants are valid and binding, a US military judge said in a ruling published Thursday, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.
summary: Plea agreements with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants are valid and binding, a US military judge said in a ruling published Thursday, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.

title: US Says Israel To Open New Gaza Crossing For Aid As Deadline Looms
content: Israel has informed the United States that it will open an additional crossing for aid into Gaza, the State Department said Thursday, as a US-imposed deadline looms next week.
summary: Israel has informed the United States that it will open an additional crossing for aid into Gaza, the State Department said Thursday, as a US-imposed deadline looms next week.

title: Undocumented Immigrants In US "Terrified", "Frustrated" As Trump Returns
content: Since learning that Donald Trump will return to the White House, undocumented immigrant Angel Palazuelos has struggled to sleep.
summary: Since learning that Donald Trump will return to the White House, undocumented immigrant Angel Palazuelos has struggled to sleep.

title: Liam Payne Took Cocaine, Alcohol, Antidepressant Before Death
content: One Direction star Liam Payne consumed cocaine, alcohol and a prescription antidepressant before falling to his death from a Buenos Aires hotel balcony last month, Argentine prosecutors said Thursday.
summary: One Direction star Liam Payne consumed cocaine, alcohol and a prescription antidepressant before falling to his death from a Buenos Aires hotel balcony last month, Argentine prosecutors said Thursday.

title: US Federal Reserve Chief Says Will Not Resign Early If Asked By Trump
content: US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Thursday that he would not resign if asked to leave early by President-elect Donald Trump.
summary: US Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Thursday that he would not resign if asked to leave early by President-elect Donald Trump.

title: US Town On Alert After 43 Monkeys Escape Research Facility
content: More than 40 monkeys were on the loose Thursday in a small US town after escaping a research facility, with authorities warning residents to keep their doors and windows closed.
summary: More than 40 monkeys were on the loose Thursday in a small US town after escaping a research facility, with authorities warning residents to keep their doors and windows closed.
